document_data.mainbody:
asks of the five senses were a type of enchanted masks of unknown origins that were in use in the 15 century DR.
These masks sharpened senses of the wearer when worn, hence granting them enhanced perception.
In the 15 century DR, masks of the five senses could be found among bandits and heroes of the Sword Mountains, Neverwinter environs, raiders from the Mere of Dead Men, and among the ruins of Illefarn.
